name: saidi-saifi
query:
SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN il IN ('BURDUR', 'ISPARTA') THEN bolge2
        WHEN UPPER(ilce) IN ('AKSEKÄ°', 'Ä°BRADI', 'IBRADI') THEN 'AKSEKÄ°-Ä°BRADI'
        ELSE ilce
    END AS ilce_bazi,

    -- ðŸ”¹ SAIDI = (âˆ‘ SAIDI * 60) / 2522766
    ROUND(
        SUM(
            CASE 
                WHEN sebebe_gore IN ('Åžebeke iÅŸletmecisi', 'DÄ±ÅŸsal')
                     AND kaynaga_gore IN ('DaÄŸÄ±tÄ±m-OG', 'DaÄŸÄ±tÄ±m-AG')
                     AND sureye_gore = 'Uzun'
                     AND bildirime_gore = 'Bildirimsiz'
                THEN saidi * 60.0
                ELSE 0
            END
        ) / 2522766.0, 8
    ) AS saidi,

    -- ðŸ”¹ SAIFI = âˆ‘ (SAIDI / KESINTI_SURESI_SAAT) / 2522766 (yalnÄ±zca ÅŸebeke iÅŸletmecisi)
    ROUND(
        SUM(
            CASE 
                WHEN sebebe_gore = 'Åžebeke iÅŸletmecisi'
                     AND kaynaga_gore IN ('DaÄŸÄ±tÄ±m-OG', 'DaÄŸÄ±tÄ±m-AG')
                     AND sureye_gore = 'Uzun'
                     AND bildirime_gore = 'Bildirimsiz'
                THEN saidi / kesinti_suresi_saat
                ELSE 0
            END
        ) / 2522766.0, 8
    ) AS saifi

FROM tablo1
WHERE 
    donem = '202509'

GROUP BY ilce_bazi
ORDER BY 
    CASE ilce_bazi
        WHEN 'ALANYA' THEN 1
        WHEN 'GAZÄ°PAÅžA' THEN 2
        WHEN 'GÃœNDOÄžMUÅž' THEN 3
        WHEN 'ALANYA BÃ–LGE' THEN 4
        WHEN 'MANAVGAT' THEN 5
        WHEN 'SERÄ°K' THEN 6
        WHEN 'AKSEKÄ°-Ä°BRADI' THEN 7
        WHEN 'MANAVGAT BÃ–LGE' THEN 8
        WHEN 'DEMRE' THEN 9
        WHEN 'ELMALI' THEN 10
        WHEN 'FÄ°NÄ°KE' THEN 11
        WHEN 'KALKAN' THEN 12
        WHEN 'KAÅž' THEN 13
        WHEN 'KEMER' THEN 14
        WHEN 'KORKUTELÄ°' THEN 15
        WHEN 'KUMLUCA' THEN 16
        WHEN 'BATI' THEN 17
        WHEN 'AKSU' THEN 18
        WHEN 'DÃ–ÅžEMEALTI' THEN 19
        WHEN 'KEPEZ' THEN 20
        WHEN 'KONYAALTI' THEN 21
        WHEN 'MURATPAÅžA' THEN 22
        WHEN 'METROPOL' THEN 23
        WHEN 'BURDUR 1. BÃ–LGE' THEN 24
        WHEN 'BURDUR 2. BÃ–LGE' THEN 25
        WHEN 'BURDUR 3. BÃ–LGE' THEN 26
        WHEN 'BURDUR 4. BÃ–LGE' THEN 27
        WHEN 'BURDUR' THEN 28
        WHEN 'ISPARTA 1. BÃ–LGE' THEN 29
        WHEN 'ISPARTA 2. BÃ–LGE' THEN 30
        WHEN 'ISPARTA 3. BÃ–LGE' THEN 31
        WHEN 'ISPARTA 4. BÃ–LGE' THEN 32
        WHEN 'ISPARTA' THEN 33
        WHEN 'AEDAÅž' THEN 34
        ELSE 99
    END;

name: performans
query:
SELECT 
    kriter_performans,
    ROUND(SUM(sayi_performans), 3) AS toplam_sayi_performans
FROM tablo1
WHERE donem = '202509'
  AND kademe = 1
GROUP BY kriter_performans
ORDER BY toplam_sayi_performans DESC;

name: performans/ilce
query:
SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN il IN ('BURDUR', 'ISPARTA') THEN bolge2
        WHEN UPPER(ilce) IN ('AKSEKÄ°', 'Ä°BRADI', 'IBRADI') THEN 'AKSEKÄ°-Ä°BRADI'
        ELSE ilce
    END AS ilce_bazi,

    ROUND(SUM(sayi_performans), 3) AS toplam_sayi_performans

FROM tablo1
WHERE 
    donem = '202509'
    AND kademe = 1
    AND kriter_performans = 'BÄ°LDÄ°RÄ°MSÄ°Z'

GROUP BY ilce_bazi
ORDER BY 
    CASE ilce_bazi
        WHEN 'ALANYA' THEN 1
        WHEN 'GAZÄ°PAÅžA' THEN 2
        WHEN 'GÃœNDOÄžMUÅž' THEN 3
        WHEN 'ALANYA BÃ–LGE' THEN 4
        WHEN 'MANAVGAT' THEN 5
        WHEN 'SERÄ°K' THEN 6
        WHEN 'AKSEKÄ°-Ä°BRADI' THEN 7
        WHEN 'MANAVGAT BÃ–LGE' THEN 8
        WHEN 'DEMRE' THEN 9
        WHEN 'ELMALI' THEN 10
        WHEN 'FÄ°NÄ°KE' THEN 11
        WHEN 'KALKAN' THEN 12
        WHEN 'KAÅž' THEN 13
        WHEN 'KEMER' THEN 14
        WHEN 'KORKUTELÄ°' THEN 15
        WHEN 'KUMLUCA' THEN 16
        WHEN 'BATI' THEN 17
        WHEN 'AKSU' THEN 18
        WHEN 'DÃ–ÅžEMEALTI' THEN 19
        WHEN 'KEPEZ' THEN 20
        WHEN 'KONYAALTI' THEN 21
        WHEN 'MURATPAÅžA' THEN 22
        WHEN 'METROPOL' THEN 23
        WHEN 'BURDUR 1. BÃ–LGE' THEN 24
        WHEN 'BURDUR 2. BÃ–LGE' THEN 25
        WHEN 'BURDUR 3. BÃ–LGE' THEN 26
        WHEN 'BURDUR 4. BÃ–LGE' THEN 27
        WHEN 'BURDUR' THEN 28
        WHEN 'ISPARTA 1. BÃ–LGE' THEN 29
        WHEN 'ISPARTA 2. BÃ–LGE' THEN 30
        WHEN 'ISPARTA 3. BÃ–LGE' THEN 31
        WHEN 'ISPARTA 4. BÃ–LGE' THEN 32
        WHEN 'ISPARTA' THEN 33
        WHEN 'AEDAÅž' THEN 34
        ELSE 99
    END;

name: arÄ±za sayÄ±sÄ±
query:
SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN il IN ('BURDUR', 'ISPARTA') THEN bolge2
        WHEN UPPER(ilce) IN ('AKSEKÄ°', 'Ä°BRADI', 'IBRADI') THEN 'AKSEKÄ°-Ä°BRADI'
        ELSE ilce
    END AS ilce_bazi,

    -- ðŸ”¹ DaÄŸÄ±tÄ±m-OG (ariza = 1 sayÄ±sÄ±)
    SUM(CASE WHEN kaynaga_gore = 'DaÄŸÄ±tÄ±m-OG' AND ariza = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS dagitim_og_ariza_sayisi,

    -- ðŸ”¹ DaÄŸÄ±tÄ±m-AG (ariza = 1 sayÄ±sÄ±)
    SUM(CASE WHEN kaynaga_gore = 'DaÄŸÄ±tÄ±m-AG' AND ariza = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS dagitim_ag_ariza_sayisi

FROM tablo1
WHERE 
    donem = '202509'
    AND kademe = 1

GROUP BY ilce_bazi
ORDER BY 
    CASE ilce_bazi
        WHEN 'ALANYA' THEN 1
        WHEN 'GAZÄ°PAÅžA' THEN 2
        WHEN 'GÃœNDOÄžMUÅž' THEN 3
        WHEN 'ALANYA BÃ–LGE' THEN 4

        WHEN 'MANAVGAT BÃ–LGE' THEN 8
        WHEN 'DEMRE' THEN 9
        WHEN 'ELMALI' THEN 10
        WHEN 'FÄ°NÄ°KE' THEN 11
        WHEN 'KALKAN' THEN 12
        WHEN 'KAÅž' THEN 13
        WHEN 'KEMER' THEN 14
        WHEN 'KORKUTELÄ°' THEN 15
        WHEN 'KUMLUCA' THEN 16
        WHEN 'BATI' THEN 17
        WHEN 'AKSU' THEN 18
        WHEN 'DÃ–ÅžEMEALTI' THEN 19
        WHEN 'KEPEZ' THEN 20
        WHEN 'KONYAALTI' THEN 21
        WHEN 'MURATPAÅžA' THEN 22
        WHEN 'METROPOL' THEN 23
        WHEN 'BURDUR 1. BÃ–LGE' THEN 24
        WHEN 'BURDUR 2. BÃ–LGE' THEN 25
        WHEN 'BURDUR 3. BÃ–LGE' THEN 26
        WHEN 'BURDUR 4. BÃ–LGE' THEN 27
        WHEN 'BURDUR' THEN 28
        WHEN 'ISPARTA 1. BÃ–LGE' THEN 29
        WHEN 'ISPARTA 2. BÃ–LGE' THEN 30
        WHEN 'ISPARTA 3. BÃ–LGE' THEN 31
        WHEN 'ISPARTA 4. BÃ–LGE' THEN 32
        WHEN 'ISPARTA' THEN 33
        WHEN 'AEDAÅž' THEN 34
        ELSE 99
    END;
